body:
Files: src/wasm/wasm-objects.{h,cc}
- Core glue classes for JS↔Wasm interop and dispatch:
  - WasmExportedFunction (JSFunction subclass): represents an exported wasm function; New() creates function with export wrapper Code; GetDebugName(sig) helper. Backed by WasmExportedFunctionData SFI data.
  - WasmJSFunction (JSFunction subclass): represents WebAssembly.Function wrapping a JS callable; constructed with signature and suspend flag. Backed by WasmJSFunctionData SFI data.
  - WasmExternalFunction (JSFunction subclass): common base for exported/c-api/js functions. Provides func_ref() accessor.
  - WasmFunctionData (ExposedTrustedObject): shared trusted data for function kinds. Fields: strong code pointer wrapper_code; protected WasmInternalFunction internal.
  - WasmExportedFunctionData (WasmFunctionData): adds protected instance_data, c_wrapper_code, const CanonicalSig* sig and CanonicalTypeIndex; is_promising() flag; MatchesSignature(); used by exported wasm JSFunctions. Holds wrapper_code used by tier-up replacement.
  - WasmJSFunctionData (WasmFunctionData): owns OffheapData TrustedManaged that manages wrapper lifetime and CodePointerTable entry. Methods: offheap_data(), GetCallable(), GetSignature(), GetSuspend(), sig_index(), MatchesSignature(). OffheapData::set_compiled_wrapper(wasm::WasmCode*), set_generic_wrapper(Address, uint64_t) return CPT entry and manage refcounts.
  - WasmCapiFunctionData (WasmFunctionData): stores canonical_sig_index for C-API functions.
  - WasmInternalFunction (ExposedTrustedObject): trusted internal callable with protected implicit_arg (TrustedObject) and WasmCodePointer call_target. try_get_external(), GetOrCreateExternal() bridge to external JSFunction. set_call_target(), call_target(). Used by funcref and imported/dispatch entries.
  - ImportedFunctionEntry: per-import entry writer; SetGenericWasmToJs, SetCompiledWasmToJs (installs wrapper into dispatch table and manages CPT entry ownership via WasmDispatchTableData), SetWasmToWasm; also callable(), maybe_callable(), implicit_arg(), target().
  - WasmDispatchTable/WasmDispatchTableData: trusted object used by indirect calls and imports; maintains entries with fields (target, implicit_arg, sig); kEntrySize layout and biases; manages offheap data owner of CodePointerTable entries for wrappers. SetForWrapper(index, implicit_arg, call_target, sig_id, signature_hash, compiled_wrapper, NewOrExistingEntry) installs generic or compiled wrapper and adjusts refcounts; InstallCompiledWrapper updates existing CPT entry to compiled wrapper; IsAWrapper(int) checks if entry points to wrapper; AddUse/uses list tracks tables referenced by instances.
  - WasmImportData: TrustedObject storing instance_data and call_origin (either WasmDispatchTable or WasmInternalFunction) plus suspend and table_slot metadata; used by Wasm→JS wrappers to retrieve calling context and resolve tier-up.
  - WasmTrustedInstanceData: central trusted state for instance: native_context, dispatch tables, memory bases/sizes, func_refs cache, feedback vectors, tiering_budget_array, etc. Provides GetOrCreateFuncRef, dispatch_table_for_imports(), dispatch_table0(), CopyTableEntries, InitTableEntries; GetCallTarget(func_index) and CodePointer table access; used by wrappers for implicit arg and other helpers.
explanation: Maps the key object-model components enabling wrappers and dispatch. These classes are the glue between compiled wrappers, dispatch tables, and user-facing JSFunction objects, providing stable anchors for wrapper replacement and tiering.
